reviewText:
...and very hard to find.  Order a copy now and add it to your film library.  Many people have never heard of this gem because it ran in film festivals but had very little commercial success in major-market countries.

Which is a disgrace, because it is absolutely compelling.  The two young men who lead the cast are outstanding.  The cinematography is excellent.  The scenes will stay with you a long time.  You will swear you know these people.

An outstanding film.
